contents.rollMessage:
%{
game.macros.getName('Power Roll!').execute({
character_name:'${escapeQuotes(name)}$',
defaultSituationalBonus:0,
ability_title:'Might',
defaultAbility:'Might',
resource_current:0,
tier_1_result:'Tier 1 Result',
tier_2_result:'Tier 2 Result',
tier_3_result:'Tier 3 Result',
power_effect:'',
might_score:${fetchFromActor(name,'might_score')}$,
agility_score:${fetchFromActor(name,'agility_score')}$,
reason_score:${fetchFromActor(name,'reason_score')}$,
intuition_score:${fetchFromActor(name,'intuition_score')}$,
presence_score:${fetchFromActor(name,'presence_score')}$
});
}%

contents.itemFilterFormula:
and(or(
    sum(
        (
            sum(
                (filter_action ? equalText(item._ability_type,'Action') : false),
                (filter_maneuver ? equalText(item._ability_type,'Maneuver') : false),
                (filter_triggered ? equalText(item._ability_type,'Triggered') : false),
                (filter_free_maneuver ? equalText(item._ability_type,'Free Maneuver') : false),
                (filter_free_triggered ? equalText(item._ability_type,'Free Triggered') : false),
                (filter_villain_action ? equalText(item._ability_type,'Villain Action') : false),
                equalText(item._ability_type,'')
            ) > 0
        ) ? true : false,
        (
            filter_cost >= item._ability_cost
        ) ? true : false,
        (true)
    ) == 3,
    not(filter_all)
),or(filter_flag,filter_flag2))

0.trait_stats: The guard can target supernatural creatures and objects within 5 squares, even if they don't have line of effect.

scCh2Wq6z7drDHhb.name: Flamebelcher
scCh2Wq6z7drDHhb.ability_tiers:
Tier 1: 2 fire damage

Tier 2: 4 fire damage

Tier 3: 5 fire damage
scCh2Wq6z7drDHhb.ability_effect: The area is covered in sticky fire until the start of the crucibite’s next turn. Whenever a creature enters the area for the first time in a round or starts their turn there, they take 2 fire damage.

btCWYekfAVarfq9c.name: Flamebelcher (3 Malice)
btCWYekfAVarfq9c.ability_tiers:
Tier 1: 2 fire damage

Tier 2: 4 fire damage

Tier 3: 5 fire damage
btCWYekfAVarfq9c.ability_effect: The area is covered in sticky fire until the start of the crucibite’s next turn. Whenever a creature enters the area for the first time in a round or starts their turn there, they take 2 fire damage. | 3 Malice The area increases to a 10 × 1 line, and if any ally of the crucibite is in the area when it is created, the crucibite deals an additional 2 damage to each target.
